entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-16
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [dotnet-sdk-8.0.100-preview.1.23107.4] Custom class "Windows" result to its elements cannot be recognized in .NET 8.0 #66888
    17.7

Updated

  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Scripting.CompilationErrorException: '(1,31): error CS1002: ; expected' #67038
  • IDE0200 doesn't account for mutable structs #66950
  • Inheritance margin tests break when enabling "Frozen Partial Semantics" in OOP. #67065
  • Unify the way MethodCompiler gets synthesized lowered method bodies #67104
    C# 12.0
  • Assert failures handling DynamicObjectCreationExpression in GetValEscape() and CheckValEscape() #67518
    Compiler.Next
  • `SyntaxFacts.IsAttributeTargetSpecifier` only returns true for all global attribute targets #67485
    Backlog
  • Very small subset of violations\rules are reported by roslyn after migration from *.ruleset files to GlobalAnalyzerConfigFiles and rditorconfig type files #67820
  • Investigate ways to potentially speed up ForAttributeWithMetadataName #67426
  • Possible bug related to `UnscopedRef` introduced in 7.1.200 #67626
    17.7
  • NRE in NullableWalker while editing code #67816
    17.7

PullRequests

Created

  • Adjust IsAttributeTargetSpecifier helper #67833

Updated

  • Collection literals natural type #67364
